Html:
Tried building from source (checked out s/ svn), but ran into a number of problems in VC# 2010 Express:

  • "Solution folders are not supported..." when opening .../3.0/sources/QuickGraph.sln
    • "Solution folder 'ci' will be displayed as unavailable"
    • "Solution folder 'Solution Items' will be displayed as unavailable"
    • "Solution folder 'Tests' will be displayed as unavailable"
    • "Solution folder 'Core' will be displayed as unavailable"

Output from opening the solution file:

C:\Users\Public\Documents\Work\Visual Studio 2010\Projects\codeplex\quickgraph\3.0\sources\QuickGraph.Tests\QuickGraph.Tests.csproj : error  : The project file 'C:\Users\Public\Documents\Work\Visual Studio 2010\Projects\codeplex\quickgraph\3.0\sources\QuickGraph.Tests\QuickGraph.Tests.csproj' cannot be opened.

The project type is not supported by this installation.

C:\Users\Public\Documents\Work\Visual Studio 2010\Projects\codeplex\quickgraph\3.0\sources\QuickGraph.Silverlight\QuickGraph.Silverlight.csproj : error  : The project file 'C:\Users\Public\Documents\Work\Visual Studio 2010\Projects\codeplex\quickgraph\3.0\sources\QuickGraph.Silverlight\QuickGraph.Silverlight.csproj' cannot be opened.

The project type is not supported by this installation.

C:\Users\Public\Documents\Work\Visual Studio 2010\Projects\codeplex\quickgraph\3.0\sources\QuickGraph.Samples\QuickGraph.Samples.csproj : error  : The project file 'C:\Users\Public\Documents\Work\Visual Studio 2010\Projects\codeplex\quickgraph\3.0\sources\QuickGraph.Samples\QuickGraph.Samples.csproj' cannot be opened.

The project type is not supported by this installation.

Some of the properties associated with the solution could not be read.

 

Build succeeds for what appear to be core components - QuickGraph.dll, QuickGraph.Graphviz.dll and QuickGraph.Data.dll, but I can't build the Samples or Silverlight code.

How can I build the samples and Silverlight stuff w/ VC# Express?

Thanks.

https://quickgraph.svn.codeplex.com/svn"
